description.@en: Whether I’m crunching numbers or attempting to explain Descartes, I know how to break down the answer.

effect.@en: Record this Talent name by your Skill Ranks— Arithmetic. Whenever you use a Skill that could be paired with Arithmetic, ignore any penalties your character is currently suffering from due to your Peril Condition Track. You also gain a +10% Base Chance to use the Skill when paired.
